source: Hey it works!
translation: Hey it works!

source: What's up, Linda?
translation: What's up, Linda?

source: I don't suppose I could just ride on top this time?
translation: I don't suppose I could just ride on top this time?

source: You know, I'm not getting any more used to this.
translation: You know, I'm not getting any more used to this.

source: You haven't been eating algae again, have you?
translation: You haven't been eating algae again, have you?

source: Prepare yourself for passage, human child.
translation: Prepare yourself for passage, human child.

source: Ya--
translation: Ya--

source: Okay, cough up the girl and no one gets hurt, fish!
translation: Okay, cough up the girl and no one gets hurt, fish!

source: Rrrrrrrrroooooooooaaaahhhhh!
translation: Rrrrrrrrroooooooooaaaahhhhh!

source: Man, it's gonna be hard to find a new place to give you lumps.
translation: Man, it's gonna be hard to find a new place to give you lumps.

source: Human child.
translation: Human child.

source: Wha--who is that?
translation: Wha--who is that?

source: It is I, the creature whose spirit was once--
translation: It is I, the creature whose spirit was once--

source: Um, over here. Behind you? Yes.
translation: Um, over here. Behind you? Yes.

source: Oh.
translation: Oh.

source: The creature whose spirit was once enslaved by the evil one.
translation: The creature whose spirit was once enslaved by the evil one.

source: You have unchained my soul, and now I shall repay you, powerful human child!
translation: You have unchained my soul, and now I shall repay you, powerful human child!

source: Oh, uh... great! Well okay, show me what you did to my friend Lili!
translation: Oh, uh... great! Well okay, show me what you did to my friend Lili!

source: By the drowned spirit of Oblongata, it is done!
translation: By the drowned spirit of Oblongata, it is done!

source: Ah--
translation: Ah--

source: Man, that must be full of sharp nails. Hate to swallow that!
translation: Man, that must be full of sharp nails. Hate to swallow that!

source: "Shaky Claim Day Care Center."
translation: "Shaky Claim Day Care Center."

source: Wow, this must have been a pretty advanced ghost town down here if they had lawn gnomes.
translation: Wow, this must have been a pretty advanced ghost town down here if they had lawn gnomes.

source: Hey, that helmet got spit at me in the Brain Tumbler vision!
translation: Hey, that helmet got spit at me in the Brain Tumbler vision!

source: I must have been fighting the Coach's idea of this monster.
translation: I must have been fighting the Coach's idea of this monster.

source: I mean, Linda.
translation: I mean, Linda.

source: Ooh, I wonder if I can find out what happened on that western I was watching.
translation: Ooh, I wonder if I can find out what happened on that western I was watching.

source: Poor, gross little sucker fish! It can't breathe! I should kill it.
translation: Poor, gross little sucker fish! It can't breathe! I should kill it.

source: Hey, I think I see a piece of teriyaki salmon jerky over there in that clam. Why don't you go eat that instead?
translation: Hey, I think I see a piece of teriyaki salmon jerky over there in that clam. Why don't you go eat that instead?

source: This freshwater lake coral is so pretty I just want to smash it.
translation: This freshwater lake coral is so pretty I just want to smash it.

source: The creature's prints are still glowing! This must be where he brought Lili!
translation: The creature's prints are still glowing! This must be where he brought Lili!

source: Ah, poor little thing.
translation: Ah, poor little thing.

source: That "poor little thing" just tried to kill me about eight different ways.
translation: That "poor little thing" just tried to kill me about eight different ways.

source: Well, that's not its fault.
translation: Well, that's not its fault.

source: This was once just a normal-sized lungfish, minding its own business in a mucus-lined air bubble beneath a semi-dry lake bed.
translation: This was once just a normal-sized lungfish, minding its own business in a mucus-lined air bubble beneath a semi-dry lake bed.

source: But judging by the work done on it, I suspect Morry has mutated it, accelerated its growth, and has placed an implant in its brain to make it do his evil bidding.
translation: But judging by the work done on it, I suspect Morry has mutated it, accelerated its growth, and has placed an implant in its brain to make it do his evil bidding.

source: Whoa. Poor little thing.
translation: Whoa. Poor little thing.

source: Yeah. Go inside there and try to smash the implant! Use the Psycho-Portal I saw you steal from Sasha's lab.
translation: Yeah. Go inside there and try to smash the implant! Use the Psycho-Portal I saw you steal from Sasha's lab.

source: Oh, uh, yeah. That works on big, scary monsters?
translation: Oh, uh, yeah. That works on big, scary monsters?

source: Oh, monster-schmonster! That thing is more afraid of you than you are of it!
translation: Oh, monster-schmonster! That thing is more afraid of you than you are of it!

source: Now git in there!
translation: Now git in there!

source: Please... my home is your home.
translation: Please... my home is your home.

source: I think I have some Teriyaki Salmon Jerky in one of these mud holes around here...
translation: I think I have some Teriyaki Salmon Jerky in one of these mud holes around here...

source: No, that's cool. Why don't you just relax. I'd like to poke around.
translation: No, that's cool. Why don't you just relax. I'd like to poke around.

source: As you wish, human child.
translation: As you wish, human child.

source: Hey, Linda?
translation: Hey, Linda?

source: Yes.
translation: Yes.

source: Could you take me back to camp now?
translation: Could you take me back to camp now?

source: Could you take me back to the Asylum?
translation: Could you take me back to the Asylum?

source: Nothing. I just wanted to make sure you're not dead.
translation: Nothing. I just wanted to make sure you're not dead.

source: As you wish.
translation: As you wish.

source: Sorry. False alarm.
translation: Sorry. False alarm.

source: (Sigh.)
translation: (Sigh.)

source: Thanks, Linda!
translation: Thanks, Linda!

source: Um-hm.
translation: Um-hm.

source: Punch coral to break it.
translation: Punch coral to break it.

source: Shakey Claim Nail Factory
translation: Shakey Claim Nail Factory
